divs: Sighting DetailsI just seen the show ufos over earth, about the bucks county pa area,Myself, Im 41,my daughter 16,and my son 15 yrs old, Definetly saw two ufos in the sky,we know they were not planes because the planes fly over our house at least 20 times aday and night to the ABE airport.
